tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Extremely courteous and high level patience 
Explained the process well , was also very responsive, before and after the treatment 
Very nicely maintained clinic and courteous staff

I had lost half of my left lateral incisor in an accident back in 2009. Back then RCT was done and the lower half of my tooth was reconstructed but soon it started to discolour. Moreover my original tooth was rabbit tooth ( slight overlap on the central incisor). And what was reconstructed back then was quite a  weird shape! My doctor back then said this was all that could be done for me.This year i had consulted another dentist and he suggested tooth extraction and prosthetics. I was not up for any of it. 
       It was then i got to know about dr.aditi and anish bharti frm a friend. When i consulted them , they suggested that they will reconstruct the prosthetic lower half. I was particular about the shape, the colour and also stated i needed the procedure done within a span of a month. Within two weeks the entire procedure was done! First a temporary tooth was provided so that all my friends and family could decide whether it suited my smile. I was at my ease to decide over days whether i was happy with the shape or not( my previous doctor never gave a temporary tooth trial and had given me minutes to decide upon the shape of my permanent tooth). After four days i revisited dr.bharti and said i am happy with my tooth and i want the premanent one to be an exact replica. They took measurements and got the permanent one ready within the week. 
          The entire procedure was absolutely painless. Moreover xrays were done in the chamber itself saving me the trouble to run around for xrays and come back with the reports at a later date. All the instruments were sterilized before my eyes before they were used on me so that i could rest assured that i would not contract any infection. Both dr aditi and dr anish were extremely friendly, they listened patiently to how i wanted my tooth to look. Now i can say that i got my natural smile back after a span of seven years. And my friends cant guess which of my tooth is prosthetic actually because it is looks so natural. I will definitely recommend my friends to visit dr.bharti.thank you for designing my smile!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Very friendly and provide medical advise so vividly . Full treatment carried out so nicely without any hindrances .

She is super helpful and the best dentist i have visited till date. She goes extra mile to help patients. In my case it was a festive holiday and they attended me specially coming from miles away and my problem was fixed within minutes. I totally recommend her for all your dental problems.

after root canal treatment my teeth suddenly fracture out.one of  dentist told me that tooth need to be removed.i was quite scared but dr. aditi and dr.anish has done gum surgery and put a cap on my tooth .i am happy that they save my tooth. kudos to them

I was asked for root canal treatment for my tooth by another dentist but he failed to do the treatment.Then one of my relative recommended to Dr Aditi and she made me comfortable throughout the procedure. The whole cost of the procedure was within my budget.

single sitting RCT has been done and crown was delivered within 10 days...m happy with the  procedures and consultant...doctor was recommended by one of my friend...nd in future i would like to recommend Dr.Aditi to my collegues nd family members.
wish u all the best.

I have visited Dr.aditi with complain of toothache.I was quite apprehensive  as my past experience With dentist was quite painful.but Dr. Aditi has taken care very nicely.she did my root canal and then put a cap on my tooth.now I m happy that my tooth is alright and in workings  condition.

context: Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Bleeding Gums Treatment,
